code: import STATUS from"./../STATUS";import STATES from"./../../../../../../reducers/console/recorder/stateDef";export default function recState(prev,current){prev=prev.recorder;current=current.recorder;var response=[];var recState=current.recordingState;if(prev.recordingState!==recState&&(recState===STATES.INIT||recState===STATES.IDLE)){response.push({status:STATUS.RECORDER,subStatus:recState===STATES.INIT?STATUS.RECORD_START:STATUS.RECORD_END,recParam:{recName:current.recName,recId:current.recId}});}return response;}
